sites.desc: Beautiful lake house properties! Would recommend to anyone interested, I'm considering buying a house there myself!
I live here during the summer. Great people but not a whole lot to do in terms of a vacation.
Not a whole lot do but you will be blown away by how beautiful this state is. Badlands National Park stands out to me as an underrated vacation destination.
I go to school here and love it but I wouldn't consider it a vacation destination...
